In summary, inventory management:
1. Managing stock levels to meet demand without overstocking or
understocking.
2. Involves tracking inventory, forecasting demand, and reordering stock as
needed.
3. Inventory control techniques include Just-In-Time (JIT), Economic Order
Quantity (EOQ), and ABC Analysis.

options: Effective inventory control maximizes holding costs, reduces stockouts, and maintains service levels.

Effective inventory control MINIMIZES holding costs, reduces stockouts, and maintains service levels.
